abstract: NBC Sports Group will show 40 weekend soccer games on USA Network, adding to matches that will continue on NBC and NBCSN.
lead_paragraph: The NBC Sports Group is facing stiff competition to maintain its rights to the elite property.

headline.main: NBC Sports Group Adds Premier League Games to USA Network’s Lineup
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Network Adds Games

snippet: The NBC Sports Group is facing stiff competition to maintain its rights to the elite property.
